title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not have any effect on the displayed results.
EB:
Regardless of whether I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report continues to display the same results. The expected behavior is as follows: 

- For Plain, the literal content (including tags) should be displayed.
- For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear as is with RTF tags. The attached report demonstrates this issue.
SR:
I have a database field that contains three types of content:

1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
3) Text with RTF tags.

I am using a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
